    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_f82da7622e4ee7543acdcb4eb7774ed35cf305c6</entry>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_f82da7622e4ee7543acdcb4eb7774ed35cf305c6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">An apparatus to display amplitudes of sound</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Apparat, zum von von Umfängen des Tones 
anzuzeigen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un appareil pour afficher des amplitudes de bruit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um instrumento para indicar amplitudes do som</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un apparecchio per visualizzare le ampiezze del 
suono</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συσκευή στα εύρη παρουσίασης του ήχου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un aparato para visualizar amplitudes del sonido</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an oscilloscope displaying the amplitude of vibration of sound.  The labelling explains how loud sounds differ in amplitude from soft sounds.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oscilloscope</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">loudness</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">softness</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vibration</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein Oszillograph, das den 
Umfang der Erschütterung des Tones anzeigt. Das Beschriften 
erklärt, wie laute Töne im Umfang von den weichen Tönen sich 
unterscheiden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un oscilloscope 
affichant l'amplitude de la vibration du bruit. Étiqueter 
explique comment les bruits forts diffèrent dans l'amplitude des 
bruits mous.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um osciloscópio que 
indica a amplitude da vibração do som. Etiquetar explica como 
os sons altos diferem na amplitude dos sons macios.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un oscilloscopio che 
visualizza l'ampiezza della vibrazione del suono. Identificare 
spiega come i suoni forti differiscono da nell'ampiezza dai suoni 
molli.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει έναν παλμογράφο που 
παρουσιάζει το εύρος της δόνησης του ήχου. Το μαρκάρισμα 
εξηγεί πώς οι δυνατοί ήχοι διαφέρουν στο εύρος από τους 
μαλακούς ήχους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un osciloscopio que 
visualiza la amplitud de la vibración del sonido. El etiquetado
explica cómo los sonidos ruidosos diferencian en amplitud de sonidos 
suaves.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Oszillograph</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lautstärke</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
